title: How to Meet or Contact Billie Eilish in Person, Online, or by Mail

steps.title: No, Billie doesn’t have a public phone number or email address.
steps.content: No, Billie doesn’t have a public phone number or email address. While you can’t call or email Billie directly, you can reach out to her team at Interscope Records . Send emails or make phone calls to: [1] X Research source Interscope Records phone: 1 (310) 865-1000

steps.title: Leave a comment or direct message Billie on her social media accounts.
steps.content: Leave a comment or direct message Billie on her social media accounts. The only official pages run by Billie and her team include: Instagram TikTok Facebook X (formerly known as Twitter)

steps.title: Send fan mail and autograph requests to Interscope Records.
steps.content: Send fan mail and autograph requests to Interscope Records. If you want to write Billie a personal letter, compliment her music, or request an autographed photo, address it to: [2] X Research source Billie Eilish Interscope Records 2220 Colorado Avenue 5th Floor Santa Monica, CA 90404-3506 USA

steps.title: Be sincere and include a return envelope to get a response.
steps.content: Be sincere and include a return envelope to get a response. Briefly introduce yourself and explain what Billie’s work means to you. Whether you love her songwriting, production, or activism outside of music, get specific about her impact to make your message more meaningful. Finish off with a polite request to return your letter, send an autograph, or answer one of your burning questions. [3] X Research source When writing fan mail , use conversational language to showcase your personality. For example, instead of saying “I love your new album,” you could say, “I have CHIHIRO on repeat, it’s such a BOP! I can’t wait to see the live performance.” To make your letter stand out (and increase the likelihood of it being read), decorate the outside of your envelope with stamps and stickers, or write Billie’s name in calligraphy . If you’re requesting an autograph, send your photo in a properly stamped and self addressed envelope. It typically takes 3+ months for a response, so try your best to be patient. [4] X Research source In the meantime, send fan mail to Jenna Ortega , Jojo Siwa , or another celebrity you admire!

steps.title: Managers: Brandon Goodman and Danny Rukasin at Best Friends Music
steps.content: Managers: Brandon Goodman and Danny Rukasin at Best Friends Music For general questions and more information on fan mail, reach out to Billie’s managers, Brandon Goodman and Danny Rukasin, at brandon@bestfriendsmusic.com and danny@bestfriendsmusic.com . Alternatively, shoot them a direct message on Instagram .

steps.title: Publicist: Alexandra Baker at High Rise PR
steps.content: Publicist: Alexandra Baker at High Rise PR For interviews, guest appearances, or other publicity opportunities, reach out to Billie’s publicist, Alexandra Baker, at alexandra@highrisepr.com . Contact High Rise PR for general inquiries at: [5] X Research source Email: billieeilish@highrisepr.com

steps.title: Concerts, festivals, & meet and greets
steps.content: Concerts, festivals, & meet and greets Attending a concert or festival that Billie is scheduled to perform at is one of the best ways to meet her. Check her tour schedule online to see if there’s a show near you, or look up popular festivals, like Coachella or Lollapalooza, to see if she’s going to be headlining. On previous tours, Billie has offered “meet and greet” packages, where fans can meet her in person and take a photo together.

steps.title: Red carpet events
steps.content: Red carpet events If you want to catch Billie in real life (and possibly snag an autograph or photo together), search for her upcoming appearances on Google. Find out when and where the event will be, and show up early to get a spot near the barricade. [6] X Research source moviepremierewithoutticket.html Previously, Billie has attended events like the Grammys, Oscars, Golden Globes, BRIT Awards, People’s Choice Awards, iHeartRadio Music Awards, American Music Awards, Met Ball, and Variety’s Hitmakers Brunch.

steps.title: TV show appearances
steps.content: TV show appearances If you want to catch Billie in real life, look up her upcoming talk show or late-night show appearances, or follow fan-run accounts, like @thereretheavocados and @billiefaneilishbe , to stay up to date on her schedule. Tickets are usually released a month in advance for most shows, but you might be able to secure standby tickets if you wait outside the studio. Previously, Billie has appeared on Saturday Night Live, The Tonight Show with Jimmy Fallon, and Jimmy Kimmel Live.

steps.title: Charity events
steps.content: Charity events For years, Billie has used her platform to raise political and environmental concerns, talking about climate change in interviews, posting about animal rights on Instagram, and encouraging her followers to vote. [7] X Research source Supporting the same causes as Billie or attending charity events that she supports may be a great opportunity to meet her. Some charities Billie has supported in the past include: Support + Feed HeadCount 412 Food Rescue MLK Community Healthcare
